greetingDescription: A Web developer from Paraguay with knowledge and experience in the PERN and MERN stacks, using TypeScript/JavaScript.
fullStack: As an experienced Full Stack Web Developer, I possess a deep understanding of both frontend and backend development. My expertise extends to crafting advanced, dynamic, and responsive web applications through mastery of the PERN and MERN stacks. I bring ample experience to deliver impactful solutions that seamlessly integrate innovation and functionality.
frontend: Specializing as a Frontend Developer, I focus on constructing aesthetically pleasing and highly interactive user interfaces. Leveraging my skills in JavaScript and TypeScript, I create responsive designs using React, a cornerstone of both PERN and MERN stacks.
backend: As a Backend Developer, my expertise revolves around constructing and managing the server-side of web applications. I leverage Node.js and Express.js to build efficient, scalable backend systems. My experience with both PostgreSQL and MongoDB databases allows me to handle complex data management tasks effectively.
